modShortDescription: This simple mod increases the skill points earned per level. There are 7 different versions: 3, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30 and 50 Skill Points Per Level.
modDescription:
This simple mod increases the [skill points](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/) earned per level.

There are 7 different versions:

1. **3 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 3.
2. **5 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 5.
3. **10 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 10.
4. **15 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 15.
5. **20 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 20.
6. **30 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 30.
7. **50 Skill Points Per Level**  
Increases the skill points earned per level from 1 to 50.

This mod is an edited version of [2 Points](https://7daystodiemods.com/ultimate-progression/) mod. Thanks and credits goes to AaronG85.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Tested and works with A20\. Updated ModInfo.xml files.
* Added two new versions.(30/50 skill points per level) Also, all versions have been combined into a single file. Now there is no need to download each version separately.
* Added 3 Skill Points Per Level version.
* Added 20 Skill Points Per Level version.

## How to Install

Extract the archived file. Then put the version you want in your “Mods” folder. Enjoy!

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/lufarb7m2j2a0zc/More%20Skill%20Points%20Per%20Level.zip?dl=1)**

**Credits:** [Abasiyanik](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/abasiyanik/), AaronG85
